0.title: MDB Training Program
0.content: Welcome! . The MDB Training Program is a 6-week, all-intensive course in iOS, Android, or React Native mobile development led by MDB instructors and mentors. On this site, we’ve published our React Native Training Program, which was developed in Fall 2020. This course contains six lectures, five mini-projects, one midterm assessment, and one final assessment. The lectures and starter code for the mini projects are public. Solutions to the mini projects, as well as assessments, are accessible only to members. About MDB . MDB recruits new undergraduates at the beginning of every Fall and Spring semester! To learn more, visit https://mdb.dev.

11.title: Lessons
11.content: This training program has six lessons. | Lesson 0: Getting Started | Lesson 1: React Fundamentals | Lesson 2: React Native Fundamentals | Lesson 3: REST API’s, Databases, and the Cloud | Lesson 4: UI/UX Design | Lesson 5: React Native Design Patterns | .

12.title: Contributors
12.content: This training program was created by Paul Shao, Will Oakley, Allison Husain, Shomil Jain, and Anjali Thakrar in Fall 2020.

16.title: Project Description
16.content: Welcome to MDB! This semester, we’ll have over 70 members, including a new recruit class of 10 of the brightest minds on campus. What better way to get to know everyone in the club than to build an app about them? We’ll be building a simple, multiple-choice trivia game to see how fast you can learn everyone’s names. You will be working alone for this project.

17.title: Starter Code
17.content: The starter code is available at this link. Here are the commands to get started. git clone https://github.com/mdbdev/reactnative-mp1.git cd reactnative-mp1 expo install expo start . The starter code contains a framework for getting started, including a Home Screen and a Game Screen. You’ll be making all of your changes to GameScreen.jsx. Here are other files that you should read over: . | App.js - serves as the entry point of the application. Defines the app navigation stack. | HomeScreen.jsx - contains the HomeScreen, which is the landing page of the app. | GameScreen.jsx - contains the GameScreen, which is where the game is played. | Styles.js - contains the CSS stylesheet for the app. | Constants.js - contains the list of all MDB members. | .
